title: Don't Lose Your Joy | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Don't Lose Your Joy | Joel Osteen
description:
It's easy to live stressed out and full of worry over the things we can't control. But we need to realize that our circumstances don't have to change for us to live our lives to the fullest. When you choose to live full of joy, God will fight your battles for you. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
